content: As you can see on the left chart at the end of the second quarter, our comparable home related active customer base declined 26% versus the reported 29%. This is the fourth largest online retailer in the home furnishings in the United States, our smart value brand pillar and strategy focused on increasing the breadth and depth of our home product assortment will help us serve this larger and still growing market. We continue to add SKUs to increase our home association, gets sharper on pricing, something that was greatly tested during the second quarter, effectively leverage our mobile app and make shopping easier for our customers.
